summary: Hopefully makes characters less ashamed to be seen in public wearing the Masque of Clavicus Vile
descriptionHtml:
Feminine Masque of Clavicus Vile 1.0

Clavicus Vile is used to having the last laugh and not eventhe Dragonborn is safe from his cruel and unusual tricks. Having reunited the daedric prince and Barbas and receiving the fabled artefact the Dragonborn thought that she had managed to avoid any unpleasant surprises, yet upon returning to civilisation she was met by laughter. She thought she would have to put aside the artefact forsaking its power, that is until now.

New file path for female masque, should be compatible exceptfor other mods altering the masque (though should be compatible with mods that change itâ€™s enchant)

Installation
Extract to your Skyrim directory: normally Steam\Steamapps\Common\Skyrim
author: Nameless
